title: Infrastructure Frenzy - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Mature   Shounen Ai
tags: Alternate World   Amnesia   Beast Companions   Beasts   Childcare   Clan Building   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Dreams   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Farming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Knowledge   Orphans   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Tribal Society   Wars
author: The Soap Is A Little Slippery   肥皂有點滑
description: Zhuang Yu stood on the back of a big blue fish with a stone spear in his hand. Below him were patches of green fields, with herds of cattle and sheep all over the mountains. The dark asphalt road led straight to the distance. The children were laughing as they herded cattle and sheep, while the water wheel next to them was flowing with white water. This is Zhuang Yu’s home. Originally, there was endless yellow sand everywhere, thousands of miles of barren lands, a lack of food, water, salt, and clothes. They lived the hardest life. Now, everything is different. Everyone has a happy expression on their faces and is full of hope for the future.>
